name: paralect-app
description: Paralect app is a full-stack React.js + Node.js (NestJS) application for managing job responses

scripts.client: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm --prefix client run start
scripts.server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm --prefix paralect-server run start:dev
scripts.install:modules: npm run client:install && npm run server:install && npm run root:install
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run client" "npm run server"

author: Deguz
